ygData.subject: Re: Real Examples of REST in Action?

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

I can't claim my Restful Objects spec [1] is particularly prominent or
well-known, but it is in use and fulfils your criteria.

You can see it in use by running one of the Apache Isis maven archetypes
[2,3]; there is also a .NET implementation [4]

HTH
Dan

[1] http://restfulobjects.org/
[2] http://isis.apache.org/getting-started/quickstart-archetype.html
[3] http://isis.apache.org/getting-started/simple-archetype.html
[4] http://nakedobjects.codeplex.com/

--001a11c2b27c8eecce04eef79c42
Content-Type: text/html; charset=ISO-8859-1
